verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> that Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto Baruch <S%H1263><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Neriah <S%H5374><s%>, when he had written <S%H3789><s%> these words <S%H1697><s%> in a book <S%H5612><s%> at the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%>, in the fourth <S%H7243><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Jehoiakim <S%H3079><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Josiah <S%H2977><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

You did say <S%H559><s%>, Woe <S%H188><s%> is me now <S%H3068><s%>! for the Lord has added <S%H3254><s%> grief <S%H3015><s%> to my sorrow <S%H4341><s%>; I fainted <S%H3021><s%> in my sighing <S%H585><s%>, and I find <S%H4672><s%> no rest <S%H4496><s%>.

And seek <S%H1245><s%> you great things <S%H1419><s%> for yourself <S%H1245><s%>? seek them not <S%H935><s%>: for, behold, I will bring evil <S%H7451><s%> upon all flesh <S%H1320><s%>, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: but your life <S%H5315><s%> will I give <S%H5414><s%> unto you for a prey <S%H7998><s%> in all places <S%H4725><s%> where you go <S%H3212><s%>.
